content.user_title: Generate Professional PowerPoint Decks with AI
content.value_statement: Creating professional presentations is time-consuming and requires design expertise. This skill provides a systematic framework for generating high-quality PowerPoint decks using evidence-based prompting and constraint-based design principles.
actual_capabilities: Generates 30+ slide professional presentations using html2pptx workflow
Implements constraint-based design with explicit prohibitions for reliability
Enforces accessibility standards (4.5:1 contrast, 18pt minimum fonts)
Uses multi-chat architecture for complex decks to manage context windows
Validates output against quantified specifications (margins, spacing, contrast)
Adapts brand guidelines while maintaining constraint compatibility
limitations: Requires html2pptx tool for optimal spatial precision
Prohibits border boxes and outline shapes for reliability
Single visual element per slide maximum
Complex decorative elements may be simplified for consistency
Brand integration requires adaptation of some visual elements

use_cases.title: Board presentations and investor decks
use_cases.description: Generate polished board decks with financial data integration, competitive analysis, and strategic recommendations.

use_cases.title: Client deliverables and project reports
use_cases.description: Create comprehensive project updates, market research presentations, and strategic analyses with consistent visual quality.

use_cases.title: Campaign presentations and brand guidelines
use_cases.description: Build campaign performance reviews, brand strategy presentations, and marketing plans with integrated data visualization.

prompt_templates.title: Simple Financial Deck
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a 12-slide financial presentation using the simple deck template. Include Q3 revenue analysis, cost breakdown, and Q4 recommendations. Use corporate blue for accents, ensure all contrast ratios exceed 4.5:1, and validate no border boxes appear.

prompt_templates.title: Complex Strategic Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Use multi-chat architecture for comprehensive market entry analysis. Architect phase: analyze market data, create narrative structure. Generate in 4 sections of 12-13 slides each. Final assembly: validate consistency and narrative flow.

prompt_templates.title: Brand-Compliant Deck
prompt_templates.prompt: Integrate our brand guidelines into PowerPoint generation. Extract colors from attached brand guide, adapt border elements to color blocks, maintain 0.6 inch margins per brand standard, and use approved typography.

prompt_templates.title: Data-Rich Technical Presentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create 25-slide research presentation integrating multiple data sources. Use constraint-based design: no border boxes, text directly on backgrounds, maximum 3 bullets per slide, 18pt minimum fonts.

output_examples.input: Generate a board presentation analyzing our Q4 performance with budget recommendations
output: Executive Summary slide with company branding
Revenue Analysis slides with bar charts showing Q4 vs planned performance
Cost Structure slides with pie charts and variance explanations
Market Position slides with competitive comparison and visualization
Strategic Recommendations slides with 3 clear actions each
Next Steps implementation timeline with color-coded priorities
All slides validated for contrast ratios, no border elements, consistent typography

output_examples.input: Create a marketing campaign performance review for stakeholders
output: Campaign Overview slide with key metrics summary
Channel Performance slides with comparison charts
Audience Insights slides with demographic breakdowns
ROI Analysis slides with investment return calculations
All slides follow brand guidelines with approved color palette

best_practices: Always create pre-execution design plan before generating slides to ensure consistency
Use multi-chat architecture for presentations exceeding 15 slides to maintain quality
Validate output with quantified checks: contrast ratios, font sizes, margins, and prohibition compliance
anti_patterns: Never generate slides without explicit design restrictions - this leads to border boxes and layout failures
Avoid requesting 'professional looking' without quantified specifications - use exact measurements instead
Do not skip validation steps to save time - unchecked slides often have contrast or spacing issues

faq.question: Is this compatible with all PowerPoint versions?
faq.answer: Yes, uses html2pptx which generates standard .pptx files compatible with PowerPoint 2016+ and online versions.

faq.question: What is the maximum slide count?
faq.answer: No hard limit, but multi-chat architecture recommended for 30+ slides. Successfully tested with 100+ slide decks.

faq.question: Can I integrate my company brand guidelines?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill includes brand integration process that adapts colors, typography, and spacing while maintaining constraint compliance.

faq.question: How does it ensure data accuracy?
faq.answer: Includes data validation checkpoints, source tracing requirements, and accuracy verification against original data files.

faq.question: What if slides do not match expectations?
faq.answer: Follow the failure response protocol: identify root cause, update design plan if needed, regenerate affected sections only.

faq.question: How does this compare to PowerPoint templates?
faq.answer: Unlike templates, this creates custom layouts optimized for your content using constraint-based design and accessibility standards.
